TopicTitle: How many computers at the same time I have installed ksp

Articles.Content: I would like to be able to install the game on my laptop
Then install it. You can. Just go to the website where you downloaded it last time and if your laptop can run KSP, then you should be able to install it the same way you did on your computer.
I think it will do, just do not want to be accused of breaking the terms of the license or something like that, I have the game and I would like legally to stay that way.

It's fine. As long as it's your computer. If you purchased the game as a household then you could install it on any computer in the house in which the group is located (i.e. the party). If purchased as individual (i.e. the party) then just your computers wherever they may be.

"grants you the right to install and use copies of the SOFTWARE PRODUCT on your computer"

"You may not distribute registered copies of the SOFTWARE PRODUCT to third parties."
